name: The Arcade Record
description:
The Arcade Record is a 2D platformer in a 80`s future themed world.

Play the little boy Billie and help him to get his record of his favourite Arcade Game back, but what does he need to play on an Arcade machine??

Coins, Coins, Coins!!

Collect all Coins in each level to play on the Arcade and to rank higher.

Movement:

moving: A,D or Left Stick

looking up or down: W,S or D-Pad Up/Down

jump: Space or X (PS4), A (XBOX)

interact: E or Square (PS4), X (XBOX)
